title: Stay Progression & Calm on Mat
summary: Add duration and tiny distance to Stay; introduce the settle-on-mat behavior.

lessons.title: Stay — Add Duration
lessons.objective: Hold Sit/Down for 5–10 seconds with you close.
steps: Cue Sit + Stay. Count to 5; mark and treat.
Occasionally step to the side and back.
supportGuidelines: Randomize reward timing to keep engagement.
If breaking: halve criteria and try again.
lessons.safetyNotes: Keep criteria easy; avoid repeated failures.

lessons.title: Settle on Mat — Intro
lessons.objective: Teach puppy to relax on a designated mat.
steps: Place mat down; when puppy steps on it, mark and treat on mat.
Lure into Down on mat; feed several treats on mat.
supportGuidelines: Use higher-value treats for staying on the mat.
Practice after mild exercise to lower arousal.
lessons.safetyNotes: Never use mat as punishment location.

lessons.title: Recall Games — Ping-Pong
lessons.objective: Make recalls into a fun family game.
steps: Two people take turns calling 'Come!' from short distances.
supportGuidelines: Keep energy high and sessions short.
If confusion: only one person calls at a time.
lessons.safetyNotes: Play in safe, enclosed spaces only.
